      • getAllPersons

        public java.util.List<User> getAllPersons()
        method to query user repository for getting list of all users from db.
        Returns:
        list of all users in db

      • saveOrUpdate

        public void saveOrUpdate(User user)
        create a new user or to commit the changes in user object.
        Parameters:
        user - it take user object to save/change the user

      • auth

        public boolean auth(java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String password)
        method for authenticate user in database.
        Parameters:
        username - email id of user.
        password - password of user.
        Returns:
        if user having authorized access or not, based on provided username and password.

      • changePassword

        public boolean changePassword(java.lang.String oldPassword,
                              java.lang.String newPassword,
                              java.lang.String userName)
        method for changing password for a user.
        Parameters:
        oldPassword - existing password of user.
        newPassword - new password that user want in place of existing password.
        userName - username/email id of user.
        Returns:
        if password is successfully changed or not.

      • signUp

        public Response signUp(User user)
        method for creating/registering new user to the db.
        Parameters:
        user - User object.
        Returns:
        Response object with the status of success or failure and login url detail.
